name: Hazy Maze Daze
description: This game is a retro Halloween-themed maze game, in which a Jackolantern must eat all candies without being stabbed by a ghost. Directional key-strokes by a user control both the movement of the jackolantern, and the movements ghosts (unintentionally by the user). When the Jackolantern eats a purple candy corn, the directional key-strokes become inverted, but the ghosts will continue to move normally according to the key strokes. The user only needs to use the up, down, left, and right arrow keys.
